.left-column[

# Garrett Grolemund
.pic-right[![](https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/85014?s=460&v=4)]
.small[
Garrett is the Editor and Chief of the Shiny Development Center,  He wrote the popular lubridate package and is the author of Hands On Programming with R and R for Data Science, from O’Reilly Media. He holds a PhD in Statistics and specializes in Data Visualization.]
